mapper.select: SELECT email, nickname, imgurl as img, COUNT(*) AS countDiary, CASE WHEN AVG(emotionscore) < -1.2 THEN '우울해' WHEN AVG(emotionscore) < -0.5 THEN '약간 힘들어' WHEN AVG(emotionscore) < 0.1 THEN '평화로워' WHEN AVG(emotionscore) < 1.0 THEN '아주 좋아' WHEN AVG(emotionscore) < 2 THEN '행복해' END AS emotion FROM diaries join member using (email) where profile_visibility = 'Y' and email != #{username} GROUP BY email, nickname, imgurl
